name: Mimeo (itch)
description:
Duplicate small cubes, large cubes, and wedges. Get Mimeo to the exit! This game is designed for VR and we would love for you to come to play it in VR with our headset! (Aqua-green hoodie [Kyle] and red and white striped button up [Stewart])

Modeling, Animation, and Programming: Kyle Morrison
Modeling and Animation: Adrian Hanson
Sound: Stewart Engart

Special thanks to Marcel

OST: https://soundcloud.com/stewart-engart/sets/mimeo
